verses.verse: Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and this is the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to gather <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H2672>masons<s%> to <S%H2672>hew<s%> <S%H1496>wrought<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> for the <S%H4548>nails<s%> for the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, and for the <S%H4226>joinings<s%>; and <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> without <S%H4948>weight<s%>;

Also <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H369%H4557>abundance<s%>: for the <S%H6722>Zidonians<s%> and they of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H7390>tender<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>builded<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> must be <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> <S%H1431>magnifical<s%>, of <S%H8034>fame<s%> and of <S%H8597>glory<s%> throughout all <S%H776>countries<s%>: I will therefore now make <S%H3559>preparation<s%> for it. So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

¶ Then he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H6680>charged<s%> him to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, My <S%H1121>son<s%>, as for me, it was in my <S%H3824>mind<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>:

But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4421>wars<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name<s%>, because thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%>.

Behold, a <S%H1121>son<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to thee, who shall be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4496>rest<s%>; and I will give him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: for his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H8253>quietness<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in his <S%H3117>days<s%>.

He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>; and he shall be my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>; and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Now, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with thee; and <S%H6743>prosper<s%> thou, and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, as he hath <S%H1696>said<s%> of thee.

Only the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>, and give thee <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then shalt thou <S%H6743>prosper<s%>, if thou takest <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>fulfil<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>; <S%H3372>dread<s%> not, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>.

Now, behold, in my <S%H6040>trouble<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> without <S%H4948>weight<s%>; for it is in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>: <S%H6086>timber<s%> also and <S%H68>stone<s%> have I <S%H3559>prepared<s%>; and thou mayest <S%H3254>add<s%> thereto.

Moreover there are <S%H6213%H4399>workmen<s%> with thee in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>, <S%H2672>hewers<s%> and <S%H2796>workers<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H6086>timber<s%>, and all manner of cunning <S%H2450>men<s%> for every manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>.

Of the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H1270>iron<s%>, there is no <S%H4557>number<s%>. <S%H6965>Arise<s%> therefore, and be <S%H6213>doing<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with thee.
¶ <S%H1732>David<s%> also <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, saying,

Is not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with you? and hath he not given you <S%H5117>rest<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>? for he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Now <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; <S%H6965>arise<s%> therefore, and <S%H1129>build<s%> ye the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, into the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
